channel.title: oil_painting on jimmyff
channel.description: Recent content in oil_painting on jimmyff

item.title: Self portrait
item.description: Tonight was the last class of my oil painting course. I attempted a self portrait using a mirror. I had a lot of fun with it but I could have done with a bit more time! üë®‚Äçüé® #oilpainting #selfportrait #portrait (I don’t have a decent snap of it as I left it drying at the college which is currently locked up for summer)

item.title: Glass containers
item.description: Painted a couple of glass containers at oil painting class tonight. Really enjoyed it! üßë‚Äçüé® #oilpainting #stilllife

item.title: Photo week 2 - Elphie again
item.description: Another painting of Elphie tonight. I ran out of time a little on this one! Could have done with another 30 minutes as I think I lost her likeness toward the end of the session.

item.title: Photo week - Elphie
item.description: Photo week at oil painting class tonight was a good excuse to try painting my baby Elphie üòÖüêæ #whippet

item.title: Still life week 2- Wii U controller
item.description: Still life week at oil painting class from a couple of weeks back. I had fun doing the reflections!

item.title: Still life week- Whisky
item.description: Still life week at oil painting class tonight. Had a fun time. Source: from life. I have actually painted this whisky bottle before digitally. I was keen to see how the painting would differ. I think I muddied my colours a little too much by changing colour too frequently and not really washing my brush so next week I will start using two bruses, one for light colours and one of dark colours.

item.title: Sky week
item.description: Tonight we had sky week, I struggled with this! Source: Pulled a holiday snap from Valletta, Malta up on my phone. (Sorry for the zoomed out photo, the canvas went missing so I only have this phone snap)

item.title: My first oil painting
item.description: First ever oil painting! I started an evening class, we had to do a portrait of the person sitting opposite us. It was really fun! üé®
